full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 231 of 262 1942 LC8Cmax7 Rodgers - cross 1 Do you see that? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. And do you see that Emmy is listed as a passenger on that flight? 4 5 A. Yes. 6 Q. To your knowledge, is this roughly around the first time you would -- that she would have flown on Epstein's planes? 7 8 A. I believe so. 9 Q. Now I want to ask you about some different names. Are you familiar with the name Annie Farmer? 10 11 A. What is it. 12 Q. Annie Farmer? 13 A. Oh, Annie Farmer, I've heard the name. 14 Q. Do you recall ever seeing Annie Farmer on any of the flights? 15 16 A. I do not. 17 Q. And according to your flight log, there is no record of anyone named Annie Farmer flying on Epstein's planes; right? 18 19 A. Correct. 20 Q. Now I want to show you documents that are in your binder that are admitted as LV4 and LV5. They're admitted under seal. 21 22 MS. COMEY: No objection. 23 THE COURT: Okay. 24 MR. EVERDELL: With the Court's permission, I'll have the members of the jury pull it up in their folders. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019093
